Name: Thigh Climbers
About the game: Nobody can say where or when the sport of Thigh Climbing was invented, but the World Thigh Climbing Federation wants to bring its competition directly to you! Play as some of the worldâ€™s best thigh climbers who have mastered the art of squeezing metal poles between their legs and launching themselves higher into the air. Beware of obstacles and incoming attacks to ensure you've climbed higher than the opposition. Compete against others who have mastered this niche technique, and see who is truly the best thigh climber in the world! Includes: -11 playable characters with different climbing stats, strengths, and weaknesses -6 unique climbing match environments all the way from snowy mountains to outer space -Multiplayer versus AI climbers or friends -Tournament ladder mode versus increasingly difficult AI climbers -4 mini-game skill challenges
